Reviews.Title: Cables are good but beware
Reviews.Author: Steven Blanton
Reviews.Content: I am please with the cables that worked but two of the four had bad ends and i could not use them had to cut and splice other than that pleased just wished that the company tested before shipping. My cables may have been a fluke not working but didnt have time to play the return game.

Reviews.Title: The extra 100 feet was what did the trick
Reviews.Author: Douglas N Garner
Reviews.Content: The Cable was actually thicker than what came with the Q-See equipment. On a couple camerasI  was able to use only the extra 100 feet and on other cameras I attached the extra 100 feet to the original cable. I did not not loose any clarity using the longer 100 ft cable. The extra cables made it all come together. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: ARLOS
Reviews.Content: I added 4 cameras to my existing survellance system and these did just what I needed  will buy again when I add more cameras

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Anthony Cramer Sr
Reviews.Content: Shipping was prompt and product was everything expected. Will definitely use again. Good value for the money as well. Great for a small store or house.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Marco Lundi
Reviews.Content: I needed longer cables for my camera system. These worked well. They are slightly thinner than the ones that came with my system. That said, I was expecting a drop off in video quality since the others were 60' long. I have not noticed a huge difference. They are coiled well, meaning that when pulled, they do not kink up.

Reviews.Title: worked great
Reviews.Author: scott haskett
Reviews.Content: They where exactly what I needed. Nice product at a nice price. Made my security camera install go very smooth. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality Q-SEE video cables
Reviews.Author: Charles K. Ballinger "cballinger"
Reviews.Content: These cables arrived individually wrapped, and the cable is thicker than the standard Q-SEE cables that came with my Q-SEE system. Hooked up each cable to camera and power supply, all tested okay.These cables were a great price at about $15 each.Would order more and they other lengths carried as I expand my system.

Reviews.Title: 100 feet cable for camera
Reviews.Author: twins57
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT!  Received the items earlier than the scheduled date.  We used these cable when they installed our camera at home.  We are very pleased with the item(s).  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Jackie Youngstrom
Reviews.Content: I have used these for a long time now and they really work good.I looked for a long time before finding these.Thanks

Reviews.Title: just needed more of em!
Reviews.Author: Alex McClelland
Reviews.Content: I have 24 hr. video going at my place of business, and needed to add some camera's, this fit the bill perfectly!

Reviews.Title: does NOT work
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Ordered these cables for a Q-See home surveillance system.  Even though these cables physically resemble the Q-See cables they are not constructed in the same manner.  The cameras run on low voltage electricity. The cables are supposed to carry the camera signal feed-back over coax and simultaneously the low voltage electricty to the camera over copper wire.  Since these cables did not contain thick enough copper wire the low voltage current could not travel the 100+ foot run.  The installers had to put local power sources for the cameras, consequently they could not be hooked up to the central power control panels located with the video unit in the server closet.  The coax seemed to work on two cameras.  When we discovered the problem we threw away the other 2 cables.  I wish to point out I hired professional installers.STAY  AWAY  from this provider

Reviews.Title: Must Get
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Dawson
Reviews.Content: If you ever do camera installs you've run into the situation when a cable is to short.This is the perfect answer. 100', heaver duty and a GRAT price.  Jsut don't order them for quick delivery, they will try to kill you with shipping.

Reviews.Title: Video cords for Home Security system install. Works well with bonus cords and adapters incuded in the set.
Reviews.Author: S. Ragin
Reviews.Content: Nice item, thanks. Video cords for Home Security system install. Works well with bonus cords and adapters incuded in the set.

Reviews.Title: Security Monitor Cable
Reviews.Author: Steve H
Reviews.Content: The four 100-foot cable package is ideal to supplement to original four 60-foot cable came with the monitor equipment. Good quality and very reasonable price. Steve H.

Reviews.Title: 100 ft cabes
Reviews.Author: Grandma Judy
Reviews.Content: Perfect addition for installing cameras needing extra long cables.  This product allowed us to put cameras on he opposite side of our home.

Reviews.Title: exactly as described.
Reviews.Author: cls
Reviews.Content: Complete set as described.  Can be used as extension wiring or as camera to recorder.  DIY'r, no hesitation in ordering again!

Reviews.Title: 100ft. security camara wire.
Reviews.Author: J. H.
Reviews.Content: I bought the Qsee cameras and needed more wiring, I found these at Amazon, for a great price and they worked great, I needed a lot more wiring then was supplied with the security system. These cables were the same that came with the Qsee security cameras. Thanks Great deal!
